official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow individuals a credit against income tax for qualified fire detector expenses.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a tax credit for expenses related to the purchase and installation of a fire detector in the home of the taxpayer.
